metadata.title: Attack Tree for Unauthorized Access
metadata.description: This attack tree outlines the potential paths for unauthorized access to the Ray Project application, focusing on weak authentication mechanisms and misconfigured access controls.

tree.description: Unauthorized access to the application via weak authentication or access control vulnerabilities.

children.description: Exploitation of weak passwords or credentials.

countermeasures.description: Implement strong password policies and multi-factor authentication.

children.description: Bypassing access controls due to misconfiguration.

countermeasures.description: Conduct regular security audits and configuration reviews.

children.description: Session hijacking through insecure session management.

countermeasures.description: Implement secure session management practices, including session expiration and secure cookies.
Establish a comprehensive security training program for developers and users.
